description.value:
A Belt formed of studded straps of leather or similar material from which hang accolades of valour. Can be: Adamantine Inlays (+3 to Parry Tests), Honour Bells (+3 to WS on first attack roll during combat), or Marks of Leadership (+3 to tests to regain Cohesion or prevent Cohesion Damage).

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Ultramarines

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
